hibernate-mapping.query: from Survey as survey order by survey.name
from Survey as survey where survey.appliesTo=:SURVEY_TYPE or survey.appliesTo='all' order by survey.name
from Survey as survey where survey.name=:SURVEY_NAME order by survey.name
from Survey as survey where survey.state=:SURVEY_STATE order by survey.name
from Survey as survey where survey.appliesTo='client' or survey.appliesTo='group' or survey.appliesTo='center' or survey.appliesTo='all' order by survey.name
from Survey as survey where survey.appliesTo='loan' or survey.appliesTo='savings' or survey.appliesTo='all' order by survey.name
